name:
YO-KAI WATCH® 2:
Bony Spirits
description:
If you purchase the downloadable version of YO-KAI WATCH 2: Bony Spirits, you can get a special in-game item that lets you encounter Robonyan F in the game and have a chance to befriend him.

A sinister force has sparked a war between two Yo-kai factions, Bony Spirits and Fleshy Souls, causing chaos throughout the world. Befriend more than 350 new and returning Yo-kai, each with unique personalities, and team up with the heroic cat Yo-kai Hovernyan to travel back in time and save Springdale!

Supports 2 Players online and 4 Players via Local Play
